name: Disc 11
description: A dedicated open-source Discord bot for Zhycorp based on our Discord bot template with more features. Easy to use, and with no coding required.

DISCORD_TOKEN.description:
What is your Discord bot's token?
Example: NTE5NjQ2MjIxNTU2Nzc2OTcw.XAcEQQ.0gjhNbGeWBsKP6FVuIyZWlG2cMd

PREFIX.description:
What is the prefix of your bot?
Example: !

EMBED_COLOR.description:
What is your bot's embed color code? (hex)
Example: 3CAAFF

LOCALE.description:
What is the language of your bot?
Example: en
Available: en, es, id

ACTIVITIES.value: ["My default prefix is {prefix}", "music with {userCount} users", "{textChannelsCount} of text channels in {serverCount} guilds", "Hello there, my name is {username}"]

ACTIVITY_TYPES.description:
Activity type list.
The order of this value is the same order as ACTIVITIES.
For example, first value of ACTIVITIES will use first value of this
Example: ["PLAYING", "COMPETING"]

OWNERS.description:
What is the owner's ID of the bot?
Example: ["319872685897416725", "390045370240991234"]

DEV_GUILD.description:
What is your server's ID?
Example: ["332877090003091456"]

NODE_ENV.description:
In which mode do you want to activate your bot?
Example: production
Available: production, development

MUSIC_SELECTION_TYPE.description:
Which music selection type do you want to use?
Example: selectmenu
Available: message (just like in previous version) or selectmenu (uses discord selection menu)

ENABLE_24_7_COMMAND.description:
Do you want to enable the 24/7 command?
Example: no

STAY_IN_VC_AFTER_FINISHED.description:
Do you want to make your bot not to leave the voice channel after playing a song?
Example: no

DJ_ROLE_NAME.description:
What is your server's DJ role name?
Example: DJ

MUTE_ROLE_NAME.description:
What is your server's Muted role name?
Example: Muted

YES_EMOJI.description:
What is your bot's emoji for every success sentences?
Example: ✅

NO_EMOJI.description:
What is your bot's emoji for every failed sentences?
Example: ❌
